name: Introduction to Java
description: Materials for Introduction to Java course given at Gda≈Ñsk University of Technology, faculty of applied physics and mathematics in 2016/17.
goal: Course goal is to give students brief understanding of Java Standard Edition 6/7 and its APIs.

quote.text: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
quote.author: Pablo Picasso

lectures.title: Introduction
lectures.description: Course introduction with basic information about rules, grades and covered materials.

lectures.title: Classes and objects
lectures.description: Basic information about classes definition and creation.

lectures.title: Inheritance and polymorphism
lectures.description: Inheritance in practice in Java: basics mechanics, super(), overriding and overloading, abstract classes and polymorphism.

lectures.title: Interfaces
lectures.description: Interfaces and object relation called composition.

lectures.title: Exceptions
lectures.description: Handling different kinds of exceptions in Java, exceptions hierarchy and creation of custom exceptions specific to our application.

lectures.title: Collections
lectures.description: Different kinds of collections and their application with different kinds of problems. Performance issues and generics will be briefly mentioned during this lecture.

lectures.title: Generics
lectures.description: Introduction to generic types and methods and their gotchas.
